line_1: Then tongue, kneeve, and cudgel she'll lay on ye sairly:
line_2: O, gin my wife wad strike hooly and fairly!

line_1: Then tongue, kneeve, and cudgel she'll lay on ye sairly:
line_2: Hooly and fairly, hooly and fairly,

line_1: Then tongue, kneeve, and cudgel she'll lay on ye sairly:
line_2: O, gin my wife wad strike hooly and fairly!
HA! whare ye gaun, ye crowlan ferlie!
I canna say but ye strunt rarely,
Tho' faith, I fear ye dine but sparely,
